scripts.transpile-examples-js: mkdir -p examples/src/lib/mithril-page-slider/ && cp lib/mithril-page-slider.js examples/src/lib/mithril-page-slider/ && cp lib/mithril-page-slider.css examples/src/lib/mithril-page-slider/ && babel examples/src/app/index/index.es6.js --out-file examples/src/app/index/index.js && babel examples/src/app/app/github.es6.js --out-file examples/src/app/app/github.js && babel examples/src/app/list/list.es6.js --out-file examples/src/app/list/list.js && babel examples/src/app/rtl/rtl.es6.js --out-file examples/src/app/rtl/rtl.js && babel examples/src/app/simple/simple.es6.js --out-file examples/src/app/simple/simple.js
scripts.transpile-examples: npm run transpile-examples-css && npm run transpile-examples-js
scripts.watch-examples: npm run watch-examples-es6 & npm run watch-examples-css
scripts.watch-source: npm run watch-source-css & npm run watch-source-es6
scripts.watch: npm run watch-source & npm run watch-examples
scripts.github: rm -rf ../gh-pages/app && rm -rf ../gh-pages/*.html && rm -rf ../gh-pages/lib && rm -rf ../gh-pages/config.js && npm run build-examples && npm run copy-to-gh
